name: Tape Deck
description:
Rewind back to the old school era and find your cassettes.

This is for my first game jam (Brackeys), I've mostly been working on my own, the only thing I've gotten help with is music. But I have enjoyed making this 3D platformer nonetheless. I hope you enjoy it!

Controls:

Space: Jump

Left Click: Crouch/Ground Pound

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Camera rotate

This game also has controller support

Music by: Unlucky the Artist - https://open.spotify.com/artist/64yoZKpTyLneeIOG4O43nN?si=Q3z4jNVbSgKByqcc9iyDig
